description: This file defines a UI component named 'Card' using the LightningJS framework. It specifies component properties, a template layout, and a state function, serving as a reusable visual element for a food delivery front-end application.

classes.name: Card
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a card with an image, title, subtitle, and meta information.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the component's state, which includes the theme object.
